modulargolems.tooltip.flame_sword_atk: Deal %s extra fire damage when attacking, bypassing target armor
modulargolems.tooltip.flame_sword_loot: Drop more golem materials when metal golems slay other golems with this sword
modulargolems.tooltip.locate_crimson: Locates the Piglin Golem Factory in Crimson Forest
modulargolems.tooltip.locate_sculk: Locates the Sculk Infested Golem Factory in Deep Dark
modulargolems.tooltip.offering.cata: Offer to [%s] to summon %s with golem reinforcement
modulargolems.tooltip.sculk_scythe_atk: On hit, create sonic burst dealing sonic damage at %s of attack damage
modulargolems.tooltip.trial_medal.cata: Right click Cataclysm boss spawner to summon boss with golem reinforcement
modulargolems.tooltip.trial_medal.spawne: Right click golem spawner to charge them immediately
